Original_Text: LONDON (Reuters) - Arsenal secured a 2-1 victory over Manchester City in a thrilling Premier League game, with a late goal from Gabriel Jesus.
NEW YORK - The New York Yankees announced a new youth baseball activity program to promote the sport in local communities.
MIAMI - The Miami Heat edged out the Boston Celtics 98-95 in an intense NBA game, led by Jimmy Butler's 30-point performance.
SYDNEY - The Australian Rugby League confirmed a new rule change for the 2026 season to enhance player safety during games.
CHICAGO (AP) - The Chicago Blackhawks signed veteran forward Patrick Kane to mentor young players in their development league activities.
TORONTO - The Toronto Maple Leafs won 4-2 against the Montreal Canadiens in a high-energy NHL game, with Auston Matthews scoring twice.
LOS ANGELES - The LA Dodgers launched a community outreach activity to engage fans ahead of the Major League Baseball season.
PARIS (Reuters) - Paris Saint-Germain dominated Lyon 3-0 in a Ligue 1 game, with Kylian Mbapp√© assisting all three goals.
ATLANTA - The Atlanta Braves clinched a playoff spot after a 5-3 win over the Philadelphia Phillies in a crucial National League game.
MADRID - Real Madrid's youth academy announced expanded training activities to prepare players for the upcoming La Liga season.
